resources.string: This shows your extact location on the map and a magenta marker will be placed on the map but you can always click on the current location button to update it. Reminder, you have to be connected to the internt(WIFI, data connection
Get places by just a click

Click on the search button and suggestions will be displayed and you click on the icon of you choice and click on it again to make it disapear and hold on for a second and the places of the icon you have clicked will be displayed to you.
Places of the icon you clicked will be displayed around your current location and they will be mapped using red markers.

Click on any red marker and a window showing place names and other information is displayed, click on the window and another screen will be displayed showing details of the place and other options to choice.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
